clues.text: In 2020 this video conferencing service founded in 2011 became the USA's No. 1 app

rounds.comments: (Ken: Each correct response in this category will be two words--one starting with "pro", the other very similar, but starting with "con".)

rounds.text: Of the 4 Republican presidential candidates to lose to FDR, he won the most electoral votes
